description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Statesman's Manual. The addresses and messages of the Presidents of the United States, inaugural, annual and special from 1789 to 1849. With a memoir of each of the Presidents and a history of their administrations; also the constitution of the United States and a selection of important documents and statistical information. Compiled from official sources ... with portraits of the Presidents" Author: WILLIAMS, Edwin - Statistician Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9605.k.7." Volume: 01 Page: 10 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1849 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003932241 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
